casebody.data:
IN RE: ASBESTOS LITIGATION, Philip Lavelle and his wife, Linda Lavelle, Appellants, Plaintiffs-Below,
v.
Federal-Mogul Asbestos Personal Injury Trust as Successor to Felt-Products Manufacturing Company, Appellee, Defendant-Below. No. 307, 2018 Supreme Court of Delaware. Submitted: March 27, 2019
Decided: April 4, 2019

AFFIRMED.
